full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,DPAL PHYAG NA RDO RJE DRAG PO GSUM SGRIL GYI SGRUB THABS SOGS/
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @003B CES DPAL PHYAG NA RDO RJE DRAG PO GSUM SGRIL GYI SGRUB THABS RDO RJE PHA LAM ZHES BYA BA @004A *, ,'DI NI AOR DU SU PI'I LI DON DRUB RGYA MTSO'I BLA MAR 'GRO MI SMAD RGYUD RAB 'BYAMS PA CHOS 'BYOR GYIS BSKUL BA BYUNG BA DANG DON NYER CAN GZHAN LA'ANG, PHAN PAR BSAM NAS SH'AKYA'I DGE SLONG BSKAL BZANG RGYA MTSOS BYAR BA'O,, ,,DGE'O, ,BKRA SHIS, ,
